name: Heroic Tale VALUE!+
description:
Calling all the heroes! Take control of a party of adventurers and embark in this dungeon crawling journey through three different scenarios!

This collection includes Heroic Tale (2018), its expansion Heroic Tale VALUE! (2020) plus a brand-new scenario exclusive to this version that concludes the original trilogy.

HEROIC TALE


"Obsessed with the idea of retrieving a powerful artifact known as the Talisman of Certainty, the King Arthus has called all the adventurers of Albhain. Cajoled with promises of fame and glory, you take your shield and sword and head off to a distant land, where a perilous expedition awaits!"

Features:
  • Delve into the dungeon in order to find the Talisman of Certainty.
  • Challenge unique monsters with different deadly skills.
  • Find new allies to help you overcome new obstacles and enemies.
  • Discover powerful weapons and armors to help you improve your characters.
  • Be ready to take on mighty bosses awaiting on every level.

HEROIC TALE VALUE!


"While the King Arthu’s health continues to deteriorate due to an unfathomable disease, his advisors desperately seek the help of the wise ascetics. Lost somewhere in the recesses of Albhain is the Chalice of Life, which they claim could negate any affliction. This is the time, as the elected disciple, to devote all your strength to protect the kingdom!"

Features:
  • Challenge the new dungeon to recover the lost Chalice of Life.
  • A new set of deadly monsters lurk in the shadows!
  • A new cast of characters that will help you getting through the labyrinths.
  • New randomized loot and treasures, including weapons, armors and spells.

HEROIC TALE VALUE!+


"After receiving distressing news from the northern Kingdom of Albhain, you immediately respond to the call for help from Prince Dorian. In the final scenario of this trilogy, old companions will join forces to prevent a monumental disaster that will lead you to confront an evil you never imagined."

Features:
  • Reach the conclusion of this heroic adventure!
  • Past allies and new dangers await you in Albhain!
  • Discover new and valuable hidden treasures and reach new heights of power.
  • Unleash the full potential of your heroes with the increased level cap.
